sailing the mississippi river in style condo meets barge. Dave Nelson , of st. paul, minn., has come up with the idea of a floating condominium community, dubbed the marquette. Dave Nelson says it would be the biggest rivercraft in the world, housing 350 people on a barge that's 600 feet long and 108 feet wide. he's trying to sell his idea with several stops in iowa this week.
